data.eml:eml: Two new species of Pseudolaguvia (Teleostei: Erethistidae) from Bangladesh.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heok Hee Ng (2005): Two new species of Pseudolaguvia (Teleostei: Erethistidae) from Bangladesh. Zootaxa 1044: 35-47, URL: http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:C8FACB78-F724-41E4-B172-D2C16349C126
